name: mitystudio
description: AI-powered music composition studio with frontend, backend, and desktop application

scripts.dev: npm run dev:frontend & npm run dev:backend
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:electron
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/node_modules backend/__pycache__ backend/venv electron/node_modules node_modules
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.desktop: node -e "process.platform === 'win32' ? require('child_process').exec('desktop.bat') : console.log('Use desktop.bat on Windows or manual electron start on Unix')"

author: mITyStudio Team
